name: Bloodhill Bastion
originalText:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, it gains double strike and haste until end of turn.
Whenever you roll {Chaos}, exile target nontoken creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: If a creature you’ve gained control of temporarily (because of Act of Treason, for example) is exiled and returns to the battlefield under your control, you will control that creature indefinitely.
